Report Maker Chrome Extension

Report Maker is a Chrome extension tailored for journalists working on eirinika.gr . It streamlines the process of creating article reports, saving you valuable time and effort.

Features
- Automatic Detection: Report Maker automatically identifies when you're on an article page, eliminating the need for manual URL entry.
- One-Click Addition: With a single click, add the current article to your personal list for easy tracking.
- Effortless Management: Managing your article list is a breeze; you can delete individual items or clear the entire list with ease.
- Quick Report Compilation: Export your list of articles to an HTML page in seconds, complete with all the necessary links.

Benefits
- Time Saving: Report Maker significantly reduces the time spent on report compilation.
- Error Reduction: Minimize the risk of manual entry errors.
- Enhanced Efficiency: Boost your productivity with a user-friendly interface that requires no learning curve.

Install Report Maker today and take control of your reporting process.
